description: A Texas mortuary owner is accused of conducting gruesome experiments on corpses, chopping off "heads, arms and spines" to test the impact of embalming fluids, officials said.
title: Owner of Texas mortuary accused of performing 'experiments' on corpses

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump hosts the 2025 Super Bowl champions, the Philadelphia Eagles, at the White House for a victory celebration.
title: President Trump hosts Super Bowl champions the Philadelphia Eagles at the White House

description: The economic impact of the tariffs imposed by the Trump administration will soon become apparent to everyday Americans and lead to a recession this summer, according to Apollo Global Management.
title: Empty shelves, trucking layoffs lead to a summer recession in Apollo's shocking trade fight timeline

description: President Donald Trump pledged to end the war in Ukraine within his first 24 hours in office. The conflict still rages.
title: Trump vowed to end the Ukraine war in 24 hours, but the conflict still rages

description: A massive power outage is affecting large parts of Spain and Portugal, including both countries' capitals, Madrid and Lisbon. Officials are investigating the cause of the blackout.
title: Massive power outage impacting Spain and Portugal

description: More than 170,000 bottles of apple juice are being voluntarily recalled by S. Martinelli & Company in 28 states for potential contamination with toxic substances, according to the U.S.
title: Martinelli's issues recall for more than 170,000 apple juice bottles for potentially toxic substance

description: Washington’s NFL franchise is set to return to the nation’s capital as part of an agreement between the organization and the District of Columbia government to build a new stadium as part of a project totaling nearly $4 billion.
title: Commanders and Washington agree to a deal to build at RFK Stadium site, a nearly $4 billion project

description: Is a recession brewing in row 33?
title: Plane tickets are getting cheaper as domestic travel demand weakens

description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday put the responsibility for reaching a trade agreement on China.
title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says it's up to China to de-escalate trade tensions

description: President Donald Trump’s first 100 days in office are the worst for the stock market for the start of a president’s four-year term since the 1970s.
title: Trump's first 100 days are the worst for the stock market since Nixon

description: The clock is ticking on trade deals that the U.S. will need to strike with many nations, most notably China, to avoid what Trump’s treasury secretary has described as an “unsustainable” tariffs war.
title: Agriculture is in 'full-blown crisis' from tariffs, farmers say

description: Activists fear Kenya's reform plan to transform two massive refugee camps into open cities could worsen anti-LGBTQ sentiment in Kenya and other parts of Africa.
title: LGBTQ refugees say Kenya’s reform plan risks leaving them out

description: Chinese online retailer Temu, known for its ultralow prices, is hitting U.S. customers with hefty import charges due to President Donald Trump's trade war.
title: Temu customers in the U.S. hit with steep import charges due to tariffs

description: NEW YORK — A Brooklyn woman said she feared for her life as she was chased, kicked, spit at and pelted with objects by a mob of Orthodox Jewish men who mistook her as a participant in a protest against Israel’s far-right security minister.
title: Mob chased Brooklyn woman after mistaking her for protester at speech by Israeli security minister

description: A San Francisco passenger claims a Waymo driverless taxi drove off with his expensive tennis equipment inside.
title: San Francisco tennis coach says a Waymo drove off with pricey equipment

description: Airports have been disabled, and shops and offices are in the dark. It is unclear how many people have been affected.
title: Spain and Portugal hit with massive blackouts affecting travel

description: A two-term Michigan state representative backed by the progressive group Justice Democrats is launching a primary challenge against Rep.
title: Rep. Shri Thanedar draws a Democratic primary challenge as the left seeks to flex its muscle in Michigan

description: Severe thunderstorms will rumble across a large swath of the United States on Monday into the evening, with the most destructive potential in the Upper Midwest.
title: Severe thunderstorms to rumble from Minnesota to Texas

description: Spanish power grid operator Red Electrica said it was working with energy companies to restore power after large parts of Spain and Portugal were hit by a power outage Monday.
title: Massive power outage hits Spain and Portugal

description: After almost nine years since Kim Kardashian was held at gunpoint and robbed of more than $9 million in jewelry in Paris, France, the suspects in that violent crime are now on trial. Kardashian is expected to take the stand and recount the details of that harrowing night. NBC’s Chloe Melas reports for TODAY.
title: Kim Kardashian to testify in 2016 Paris robbery trial

description: Police say a 30-year-old man plowed a black SUV through a crowded street festival on Saturday as people celebrated Filipino culture in Vancouver, Canada. The man has been charged with eight counts of second-degree murder. Police do not believe the attack was an act of terrorism. NBC’s Dana Griffin reports for TODAY.
title: Man charged after plowing SUV into crowd in Vancouver, killing 11

description: Cardinals will gather for the papal conclave — the centuries-old tradition through which a new head of the Catholic Church is elected — starting on May 7.
title: Papal conclave to elect Pope Francis' successor to begin on May 7

description: Surveys show how Americans feel about Donald Trump’s job performance and his handling of big issues.
title: Survey results Trump's job performance and murder charges in Vancouver crash: Morning Rundown

description: A runaway miniature dachshund in Australia named Valerie has been found alive and well after she went missing for 529 days in the wilderness.
title: Escaped dog in Australia is rescued after 529 days alone in the wilderness

description: MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. — A shooting in the popular South Carolina tourist town of Myrtle Beach left 11 people injured, and police fatally shot one person, authorities said.
title: 11 injured in Myrtle Beach shooting and police fatally shoot 1

description: Amid political polarization across the country and lack of faith in the two-party system to solve people’s problems, a large number of younger Americans say they have abandoned both the national Republican and Democratic parties.
title: Young independents grapple with frustration over the two-party system

description: Democratic Rep. Josh Gottheimer argues in his first TV ad of the New Jersey governor's race that he is ready to fight President Donald Trump — and he's using artificial intelligence to make his case.
title: Josh Gottheimer uses AI in anti-Trump ad for the New Jersey governor's race

description: A major shakeup is coming to one of the biggest churches in Dallas, as Bishop T.D.
title: T.D. Jakes stepping aside as lead pastor at The Potter’s House megachurch in Dallas

description: First-time nominees Chubby Checker, Joe Cocker and Bad Company will be inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, a class that also includes pop star Cyndi Lauper, the hip-hop pioneers Outkast, the rock duo the White Stripes and grunge masters Soundgarden.
title: Chubby Checker, Joe Cocker, Bad Company, Cyndi Lauper and Outkast get into Rock & Roll Hall of Fame

description: There are major unresolved questions over Medicaid spending, tax cuts and clean energy rollbacks as Republican lawmakers begin crafting the legislation.
title: 5 policy issues Republicans are clashing over in a massive bill for Trump's agenda

description: Younger Americans, particularly those in Gen Z, tend to describe themselves as feeling lonelier and more anxious about the future than their elders, according to findings in the new NBC News Stay Tuned Poll, powered by SurveyMonkey.
title: Poll: Young Americans are more likely to feel lonely, anxious about the future

description: According to an NBC News analysis, Trump has spent 12 of the 14 past weekends at his own properties, and he's traveled far less than he did during this same period in his first term.
title: Trump traveled little in his first 100 days, preferring to spend time at Mar-a-Lago

description: As President Donald Trump hits the 100-day mark of his presidency, a spate of new polling shows significant warning signs on signature issues like the economy and cutting the size of government.
title: What the polls say about Trump's presidency at 100 days

description: Israel will face accusations of breaking international law by refusing to let aid into Gaza at the International Court of Justice in The Hague starting Monday.
title: Israel faces International Court of Justice over Gaza aid blockade

description: Yemen’s Houthi rebels on Monday alleged a U.S. airstrike hit a prison holding African migrants, killing at least 68 people and wounding 47 others.
title: U.S. strikes on Yemen struck a prison holding 68 African migrants, Houthis say

description: A Catholic diocese wants to stop New Jersey from trying to empanel a grand jury to investigate allegations of clergy sexual abuse, with arguments before the state’s high court set for Monday.
title: NJ high court to hear case between Catholic diocese, prosecutor over investigating sex abuse claims

description: North Korea confirmed for the first time Monday that its troops were fighting alongside Russia in its war against Ukraine, saying they helped Moscow take back control of its Ukraine-controlled Kursk region.
title: North Korea confirms it sent troops to Russia, calling them 'heroes'

description: An estimated 114 undocumented immigrants were detained at an "underground nightclub" in Colorado following a U.S. Drug Enforcement raid, officials said.
title: Over 100 undocumented immigrants detained at 'underground nightclub' in Colorado, DEA says

description: Multiple people are injured after a boat collided with the Clearwater Ferry in Florida on Sunday night, officials said.
title: Multiple injuries reported after boat hits Clearwater Ferry in Florida

description: Jarren Duran, who revealed this month that he had tried to take his life three years ago, said Sunday that he has good support today and appreciates the way security handled it.
title: Cleveland fan ejected for heckling Red Sox star who had revealed suicide attempt

description: Jordon Hudson shut down a question about how she and Bill Belichick met as the Super Bowl-winning coach was being interviewed while promoting his forthcoming biography.
title: Bill Belichick's girlfriend shuts down question about how they met during interview

description: MANCHESTER, N.H. — Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker took a stage commanded by past presidential hopefuls Sunday and implored Democrats to forcefully resist the Trump administration while panning leaders in his own party for having acted too timid for too long.
title: JB Pritzker implores Democrats to fight Trump as the potential 2028 candidate visits New Hampshire

description: A new study published Sunday in the New England Journal of Medicine reveals just how effective immunotherapy is at battling cancer, eliminating the need for surgery in some patients. NBC News' Dr. John Torres explains.
title: Major breakthrough in cancer treatment

description: There are growing questions about the circumstances surrounding the Trump administration's deportations of families. ICE says last week there were nearly 800 arrests across Florida. NBC News’ Marissa Parra reports.
title: New scrutiny over deportations of parents with children
